thread.title: Time Hotel
thread.title_full: Time Hotel - Review of The Time New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Nikon J
title: Time Hotel
text: This is the second time I have stayed at the Hotel and enjoyed the stay just as much as the first. Rooms are small, but they are very nice and extremely clean. They also provide you with very cool lounge area and bar and restaurant. Jack, Josh, Howard, and Jay offered me outstanding service when arriving, during and leaving the Hotel. Definitely, will come back and highly recommend.
